Text: Anyone who have the song/melody by Ennio Morricone from the 1978 football World Cup, i think its called "Mundial" ????
Clean download, no spyware. Beautiful movie btw, loved robert deniro

Absolutely beautiful.  Helped out in finding an instrumental for "Nella Fantasia" which is reprised in the themes throughout this soundtrack, but notably in the two versions of "Gabriel's Oboe."

Thanks so much!
